entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tracing GC on iOS yields mono_coop_cond_signal Cannot transition thread 0x2016c7280 from STATE_BLOCKING with DO_BLOCKING #16080
  • Image only Aspect fill #16076
  • Azure Pipelines Fails in the Restore Nuget Step on the solution when the solution has a Test project associated with it. #16075
  • Including specific android libraries via nuget causes AOT failures on RELEASE build #16074
  • Picker selected index is always 0 on load! #16073
  • Right click to 'Archive for Publishing' iOS projects with native binding projects fail due to Android OS versions #16072
  • [Bug] [Windows] File Picker Crashes After File Not Found #16068
  • Allow Changing AppShell at runtime #16067
  • [WinUI] .Net MAUI CollectionView with SelectionMode=Multiple shows tick marks without obvious way to remove them #16066
  • When border is added as Content the Desired Size Height is not updated properly when changing at runtime. #16064
    Backlog
  • .Net MAUI CollectionView slows down when SectionHeadersPinToVisibleBounds is true in iOS platform . #16062
  • Slider MinimumTrackColor has no effect on Windows #16056
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android]Can't tap with Frame in CollectionView on Android #7121
    .NET 8
  • Blank .NET MAUI App shows "Spelling error - Semibold is not a word" #16069
  • Collection View Header and Empty View not showing on Android when ItemSource is null #8934
    .NET 8
  • Accessibility Insights reports E_UNEXPECTED error when accessing the text from a .NET MAUI Editor control #9893
    Backlog
  • WebView clears all other control elements rendered before it into blank #12734
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] No way to change the `TextColor` for the `Switch` control #16047
  • Set up an Azure Devops image with maui pre-installed, as this would reduce CI times for most users significantly #16052
  • Blue screen when using the latest version of VS, generating Release or distributing Android #15706
  • 在Resources设置Label的VerticalTextAlignment属性导致程序崩溃,报错Value does not fall within the expected range. #14003

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks; #16078
  • Android has issues with Entry #16077
  • [Windows] Fix Slider MinimumTrackColor (#16056) #16057
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-slider

Updated

  • Replace MessagingCenter in AlertManager #12910
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, platform/tizen, control-dialog
  • Make Add/Remove Logical public #16046
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • Move most controls to use ModifyMapping (and variants) #15058
  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
    area/shell 🐢
  • Improve the customization of WebView on Android #16032
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Use AppendToMapping for Element and VisualElement #14948
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Windows Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
